db:abstract.db:para: The example shows the look and feel of the different built-in themes.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += charts requires(qtConfig(combobox))
HEADERS += \ themewidget.h
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ themewidget.cpp
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/charts/chartthemes INSTALLS += target
FORMS += \ themewidget.ui
